title: mega
text:

library(readr)
library(dplyr)


Attaching package: 'dplyr'


The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    filter, lag


The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

library(jsonlite)

# Step 1: Load the dataset
lemma_data <- read_csv("Lemma-base-draft-ADJ.csv")

Rows: 581 Columns: 40


── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (31): transliteration, sorting, period, morphology, number, person, clas...
dbl  (2): certainty-weight_MEGA, frequency
lgl  (7): validator, unicode, Wordnet, case, conjugation, mode, voice

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

# Step 2: Inspect the structure
glimpse(lemma_data)

Columns: 40

$ sorting                 <chr> "aa", "hibattinna", "haakqamannuis~s~iya", "am…
$ period                  <chr> "oE; nE", "achE", "achE", "achE", "achE", "ach…

$ number                  <chr> "Sg.", NA, NA, "Sg.", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, …
$ person                  <chr> "1st", NA, NA, "1st", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, …
$ class                   <chr> NA, NA, "anim.", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, N…
$ affix                   <chr> NA, "-na", NA, NA, NA, NA, "-na", "-k", "-k", …
$ semantics               <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…

$ base                    <chr> "ai", "Hipat", "hakamanušiya", "aminu", "tema-…
$ pagenumber              <chr> "13", "655", "573", "54", "317", "317", "806",…
$ `adjectival use`        <chr> NA, "x", "x", "x", "x", "x", NA, "x", NA, "x",…
$ classifier_front        <chr> NA, "AŠ", "DIŠ", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, N…
$ classifier_end          <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ logogram                <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ morpheme_1              <chr> NA, "-na;postp.gen", NA, NA, "-na;postp.gen", …
$ morpheme_2              <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, "-na;postp.gen", NA, N…

$ sense_MEGA              <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, "journey", NA, "to tra…
$ `certainty-weight_MEGA` <dbl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, 0.5, NA, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5…
$ proper_name_context     <chr> "anthroponym", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA,…
$ contributor             <chr> "f", "f", "f", "f", "f", "f", "f", "f", "f", "…
$ validator               <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ lang_context            <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ loan_lang               <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ unicode                 <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ Wordnet                 <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ Notes                   <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ POS                     <chr> "adjective", "adjective", "adjective", "adject…
$ variant                 <chr> "a-ù-ù, a-a-i-[im?]-bu", "h.hi-ba-at", "hhh.ha…
$ cognate                 <chr> NA, NA, "haxāmanišya", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA,…
$ case                    <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ conjugation             <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ mode                    <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ voice                   <lgl> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA…
$ frequency               <dbl> 2, NA, NA, 1, NA, 4, NA, NA, NA, 1, NA, 12, 1,…
$ rich                    <chr> "<qt><font color=\"#690000\">a</font>-<font co…

# Step 3: Categorize data
ontology_groups <- list(
  identification = lemma_data %>% select(transliteration, sorting, base, variant),
  linguistic_features = lemma_data %>% select(period, morphology, number, person, POS, frequency),
  semantics_context = lemma_data %>% select(semantics, proper_name_context, loan_lang, lang_context),
  validation_contribution = lemma_data %>% select(contributor, validator),
  supplementary_notes = lemma_data %>% select(pagenumber, Notes, rich)
)

# Step 4: Save to JSON
write_json(ontology_groups, "lemma_data.json", pretty = TRUE)
